About Us
The  North Brevard Senior Center, Inc.
,
is a private non-profit corporation, located at 909 Lane Ave. in Titusville, FL 32780
NBSC operates a multi-purpose Senior Center to provide for health, social, educational, informational, and recreational services for seniors. The Senior Center is for people starting at the age of 50 years and older.
We also are a rental facility for all types of social activities, both public and private. One large room accommodates up to 200 people, with a raised stage, lights, and alcove area.   A full kitchen with two standard ovens and a professional convection oven.  Commercial refrigerator and much more.  Must have a certified kitchen manager on site to cook in kitchen.
We encourage you to stop by, check out, and join us here at the North Brevard Senior Center,
and have fun with friends you haven't met yet !
​
Article IV
Click the button to review the responsibilities and duties of our corporate officers per Article IV of our By-Laws.  The Center is in need of capable people like you to step up and share your talents and ideas.
